title: The Draymond Green Show - Kyle Kuzma
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Kyle Kuzma
description:
Kyle Kuzma joins The Draymond Green Show to discuss the differences playing in the NBA on the east coast vs. the west coast (2:00), why nicknames have gone out of style in the league (7:30), the biggest fashion stars in the NBA (12:30), his journey from Flint to Utah to Los Angeles (24:00), how his time with the Lakers gave him access to Kobe Bryant and LeBron James (31:30), how his first season with the Wizards went (47:00), why it’s silly to compare eras of the NBA (54:00), and much more. #Herd

Produced by: Jackson Safon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
